mapper.sql: a.id, a.type, a.name, a.price, a.images, a.area, a.baths, a.beds, a.rating, a.remarks, a.properties, a.floor_plan, a.tags, a.create_time, a.city_id, a.community_id, a.address, a.state
mapper.select: select id, house_id, user_id, create_time, type from house_user where house_id = #{id} and type = 1 limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into house( type, name, price, images, area, beds, baths, rating, remarks, properties, floor_plan, tags, create_time, city_id, community_id, address, state ) value( #{type}, #{name}, #{price}, #{images}, #{area}, #{beds}, #{baths}, #{rating}, #{remarks}, #{properties}, #{floorPlan}, #{tags}, #{createTime}, #{cityId}, #{communityId}, #{address}, #{state} )
insert into house_user (house_id, user_id, create_time, type) value( #{houseId}, #{userId}, #{createTime}, #{type} )
insert into house_msg ( msg, create_time, user_name, house_id, agent_id ) value( #{msg}, #{createTime}, #{userName}, #{houseId}, #{agentId} )
